item.title: Whereabouts of journalist Austin Tice, McClatchy contributor, unknown in Syria | McClatchy
item.description: Many of you have asked about @Austin_Tice, out of touch in #Syria for 10 days now. Here is an update: http://t.co/3fRmCuql
item.content:encoded: Many of you have asked about @Austin_Tice, out of touch in #Syria for 10 days now. Here is an update: http://t.co/3fRmCuql Austin Tice, a freelance American journalist who was working in Syria for McClatchy Newspapers, The Washington Post and other media outlets, has been incommunicado for more than a week, his whereabouts unknown since exchanging email with a colleague. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: mcclatchydc.com
